title: Honor Lvl climb
body:
Hey everyone .. I just noticed that clash is coming back soon and for taking part you have to be at least honor lvl 2 ... Bout 3 months ago i got a 14 day suspension because of flaming and my honor lvl 
dropped to 0 ... By now I only got from dishonorable to lvl 0 even tho I instantly mute everyone at the start of the game and the tons of honors I require... I'm afraid I won't make it back to lvl 2 in time .. Is there any way I can make it back in such a quick time? 
Ty for every response in advance!

replies.body: the best way is just play ;) u can get more honors for shotcalling / macroplay like be the one that notes times in chat when enemy flash is up... say ur team to pressure top for a free drag say ur team to pressure sidelanes so u can get mid tower etc

Well ty for your response but .. to be totally honest I dont think the honors are the problem like I get at least 1 honor every game and just today I had 3 games with 3 honors but still honor lvl 0 .. I just don't get the system

yeah riot makes the first few levels after a suspension alot harder ;) cause it would make no sense when a toxic player just gets nice at end of season to get honor rewards even if they arent honorable at all ;) keep it going and your honor will rise
it wont. My brother got banned 3 months ago, and is still not even lv 1 (he playes a lot with premades and they honoch each other.)
well premade honors are not much worth or even worth nothing :D it maybe be like with vision score ^^ a ward (honor) in ur own base   (premade) is worth like 0.1 of a ward that is placed good...

non premade honors=2 points
premade honors = 1 point
not really sure about that^^ i know u get the flair... but i remember the old honor and u could have 10k honors from premades and still dont get a flair

good intention, but its not true. 
Wether you get honors is just luck.
Most players dont care, they either dont use it at all or give it to someone random.
well i honor every game mostly the best guy or the one that did help...
